string.text:
The .357 Monolithic round is a pseudo-FMJ bullet. The round's unique nose design offers high tissue damage while also offering greater penetration compared to a .357 HP round. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]BR4 (40) 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]71
